scripts.check:all: npm run install:all && npm run lint:all && npm run test:all && npm run build:all && npm run start:all:check
scripts.install:all: npx install-peerdeps --dev eslint-config-react-app && cd ./client && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.start:all: npm run stop:all && chmod +x scripts/start:all.sh && scripts/start:all.sh
scripts.start:all:check: npm run stop:all && chmod +x scripts/start:all.sh && scripts/start:all.sh --check
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:client
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:general && npm run lint:security
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:client && npm run build:integrate
